data.trans_hint: Sử dụng năng lượng hiệu quả được cho là một giải pháp quan trọng cho vấn đề thay đổi khí hậu và ô nhiễm.
data.en_hint: Efficient energy use is considered an important solution to the issues of climate change and pollution.
data.content_game_1: Efficient energy use is considered an important solution to the issues of climate change and pollution.
data.answer_en_hint: Efficient energy use is considered an important solution to the issues of climate change and pollution.

data.trans: Sự quan tâm, sự lo ngại
data.trans_hint: Sự lo ngại đang gia tăng về vấn đề rác thải điện tử ở khu vực này.
data.en_hint: There is growing concern about electronic waste in this area.
data.content_game_1: There is growing concern about electronic waste in this area.
data.answer_en_hint: There is growing concern about electronic waste in this area.

data.trans_hint: Chiến tranh có thể ngắn nhưng tác động tới môi trường có thể kéo dài trong nhiều thập kỷ.
data.en_hint: The war may be short but the environmental impacts could last for decades.
data.content_game_1: The war may be short but the environmental impacts could last for decades.
data.answer_en_hint: The war may be short but the environmental impacts could last for decades.

data.trans: Có thể dùng để thay thế
data.trans_hint: Tương lai của chúng ta phụ thuộc vào các nguồn tài nguyên thay thế có thể làm mới được.
data.en_hint: Our future depends on alternative renewable resources.
data.content_game_1: Our future depends on alternative renewable resources.
data.answer_en_hint: Our future depends on alternative renewable resources.

data.trans: Luân phiên, xen kẽ, thay phiên
data.trans_hint: Suốt kì nghỉ lễ, thời tiết cứ thay phiên nhau mưa rồi nắng mỗi ngày.
data.en_hint: Throughout the holiday, the weather alternated between rain and sunshine every day.
data.content_game_1: Throughout the holiday, the weather alternated between rain and sunshine every day.
data.answer_en_hint: Throughout the holiday, the weather alternated between rain and sunshine every day.

data.trans_hint: 5000 người trên khắp thế giới đã được mời tham gia hội nghị về sự nóng lên toàn cầu.
data.en_hint: 5,000 people from around the world were invited to attend the conference about global warming.
data.content_game_1: 5,000 people from around the world were invited to attend the conference about global warming.
data.answer_en_hint: 5,000 people from around the world were invited to attend the conference about global warming.

data.trans_hint: Sự thay thế nhiệt điện bằng năng lượng mặt trời có thể bảo vệ môi trường.
data.en_hint: The substitution of solar energy for thermal electricity could protect the environment.
data.content_game_1: The substitution of solar energy for thermal electricity could protect the environment.
data.answer_en_hint: The substitution of solar energy for thermal electricity could protect the environment.

data.trans_hint: Các sản phẩm phù hợp với môi trường sẽ tối thiểu các tác hại lên môi trường.
data.en_hint: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.
data.content_game_1: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.
data.answer_en_hint: Environmentally compatible products minimize the adverse effects on the environment.

data.trans: Thiếu thận trọng, khinh suất, thiếu suy nghĩ
data.trans_hint: Chương trình truyền hình cho thấy các sinh vật biển đang phải vật lộn để đối phó với lượng nhựa bị đổ xuống đại dương một cách thiếu suy nghĩ.
data.en_hint: The TV program showed marine life struggling to cope with the amount of plastic inconsiderately dumped into the oceans.
data.content_game_1: The TV program showed marine life struggling to cope with the amount of plastic inconsiderately dumped into the oceans.
data.answer_en_hint: The TV program showed marine life struggling to cope with the amount of plastic inconsiderately dumped into the oceans.

data.trans_hint: Phá rừng bất hợp pháp đã dẫn đến sự tăng lên trong số lượng động vật tuyệt chủng.
data.en_hint: Illegal logging has led to an increase in the number of animals that have become extinct.
data.content_game_1: Illegal logging has led to an increase in the number of animals that have become extinct.
data.answer_en_hint: Illegal logging has led to an increase in the number of animals that have become extinct.

data.trans_hint: Những phát triển về vấn đề môi trường này sẽ được giải quyết trong một báo cáo tiếp theo.
data.en_hint: Developments on this environment issue will be dealt with in a subsequent report.
data.content_game_1: Developments on this environment issue will be dealt with in a subsequent report.
data.answer_en_hint: Developments on this environment issue will be dealt with in a subsequent report.

data.trans_hint: Các phương tiện giao thông thải ra hàng tấn khí thải mỗi ngày.
data.en_hint: Vehicles release tons of exhaust fume everyday.
data.content_game_1: Vehicles release tons of exhaust fume everyday.
data.answer_en_hint: Vehicles release tons of exhaust fume everyday.
